casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Destiny Raye THOMPSON. No. 610P03. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 4, 2004. James N. Freeman, Jr., for Thompson. Marc Bernstein, Assistant Attorney General, Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 24th day of November 2003 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 4th day of March 2004."
